question.ask: Questions 1~2 You are in the hospital visiting your friend Alan who broke his leg. So you ask him two questions.

std.value: Are you feeling well? How did you break your leg?
std.ai: Are you feeling well? How did you break your leg?

std.value: How do you feel now? When can you leave the hospital?
std.ai: How do you feel now? When can you leave the hospital?

std.value: How is your leg? How long have you been in hospital?
std.ai: How is your leg? How long have you been in hospital?

std.value: Is your leg badly hurt? When will you recover?
std.ai: Is your leg badly hurt? When will you recover?

std.value: Do you still feel a pain in your leg? When will you recover from a broken leg?
std.ai: Do you still feel a pain in your leg? When will you recover from a broken leg?

std.value: How do you feel now? How did you hurt your leg?
std.ai: How do you feel now? How did you hurt your leg?

std.value: Are you feeling well? When did you hurt your leg?
std.ai: Are you feeling well? When did you hurt your leg?

std.value: How is your leg? When did you break your leg?
std.ai: How is your leg? When did you break your leg?

std.value: Is your leg badly hurt? When will you be discharged from hospital?
std.ai: Is your leg badly hurt? When will you be discharged from hospital?

std.value: When were you admitted to hospital? How long will you stay in hospital?
std.ai: When were you admitted to hospital? How long will you stay in hospital?

std.value: How is your leg? How many days have you been in hospital?
std.ai: How is your leg? How many days have you been in hospital?

std.value: How do you feel now? How long have you stayed in hospital?
std.ai: How do you feel now? How long have you stayed in hospital?

std.value: Is your leg badly hurt? How many days have you stayed in hospital?
std.ai: Is your leg badly hurt? How many days have you stayed in hospital?

std.value: Are you feeling well? How long will you recover from a broken leg?
std.ai: Are you feeling well? How long will you recover from a broken leg?

std.value: How do you feel now? How many days will you stay in hospital?
std.ai: How do you feel now? How many days will you stay in hospital?

question.keywords: Are feeling well How break leg|How feel When leave hospital|How is leg How long hospital|Is leg badly hurt When recover|Do pain leg When recover broken leg|How feel How hurt leg|Are feeling well When hurt leg|How is leg When break leg|Is leg badly hurt When discharged hospital|When admitted hospital How long stay hospital|How is leg How many days hospital|How feel How long stayed hospital|Is leg badly hurt How many days stayed hospital|Are feeling well How long recover broken leg|How feel How many days stay hospital

std.value: Do you have any tickets to Beijing for tomorrow? How much is a ticket to Beijing?
std.ai: Do you have any tickets to Beijing for tomorrow? How much is a ticket to Beijing?

std.value: Can I get a refund on this ticket? How much is the cancellation fee?
std.ai: Can I get a refund on this ticket? How much is the cancellation fee?

std.value: Can I exchange this ticket? How can I exchange this ticket?
std.ai: Can I exchange this ticket? How can I exchange this ticket?

std.value: Are there any tickets left to Chengdu today? How about for tomorrow?
std.ai: Are there any tickets left to Chengdu today? How about for tomorrow?

std.value: Can I return my ticket for a refund? How much is the cancellation fee?
std.ai: Can I return my ticket for a refund? How much is the cancellation fee?

std.value: Can I buy a ticket for my friend? How much is a ticket to Xi’an?
std.ai: Can I buy a ticket for my friend? How much is a ticket to Xi’an?

question.ask: Questions 3~4 You are at the booking office of Shanghai Railway Station. Ask the office worker inside two questions.
question.keywords: Do have tickets How much is ticket|Can get refund ticket How much is cancellation fee|Can exchange ticket How can exchange ticket|Are there tickets left How about|Can return ticket refund How much is cancellation fee|Can buy ticket friend How much is ticket
